themes.title: Probiotic Awareness Gap

themes.impact: Deploy pediatric-led education campaigns and translate probiotic science into visual content.

themes.title: Old Brand, Young Doubts
themes.story: Morinaga has legacy trust but feels outdated vs. competitors like Enfa or Friso.
themes.story_preview: Morinaga has legacy trust but feels outdated vs. competitors like Enfa or Friso.

themes.title: Invisible in E-Commerce
themes.story: Morinaga probiotic SKUs often look identical to standard formulas online.
themes.story_preview: Morinaga probiotic SKUs often look identical to standard formulas online.
themes.impact: Fix product detail pages and emphasize BB536 in visuals and naming.

people.name: Millennial Urban Mothers
people.behaviors: Explore parenting forums, follow pediatrician creators, value science-backed products.
people.implications: Feature reviews and science summaries in e-commerce PDPs and mom groups.

people.name: Health-First Fathers
people.behaviors: Skim clinical evidence and compare nutritional labels before purchase.
people.implications: Build comparisons and authority-driven copy into landing pages and videos.

narratives.title: Parenting Community Leaders
narratives.story: Momfluencers and pediatricians shape infant formula opinions through YouTube, IG, and WhatsApp groups.
narratives.takeaway: Engage local pediatric experts and multilingual momfluencers for regional relevance.

narratives.title: Pharmacist Educators
narratives.story: Malaysian pharmacists often advise on formula at the point of saleâ€”especially in HealthLane or Caring chains.
narratives.takeaway: Offer shelf-talkers and QR code training tools to improve pharmacy-led recommendations.

hypotheses.statement: Emphasizing BB536 on packaging and in digital channels will increase trust and trial conversion by 25% among Malaysian urban mothers.
Partnering with pediatricians and multilingual momfluencers will increase engagement by 40% versus traditional brand ads.

recommendations.title: Rebrand BB536 Probiotic SKU
recommendations.body: Redesign e-commerce and in-store messaging to clearly spotlight probiotic function and gut health story.

recommendations.title: Activate Pediatrician & Influencer Network
recommendations.body: Equip doctors and trusted momfluencers with content kits to explain BB536â€™s science in simple, relatable ways.

recommendations.title: Multilingual Education Campaigns
recommendations.body: Run content in Malay, English, and Chinese across parenting forums and video channels to close probiotic awareness gaps.
